short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a simple extension that helps generate a preference-based git branch name out of an Azure DevOps item

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a developer that is working on Azure DevOps as your Agile Board,
This extension will help you create a branch name, the way you define it to be, for a selected item in the Azure DevOps "Sprints Board" section.

You can define a structure for your branch name with different data to display, and different separators between data

Number - from a task/workitem
User name - assignee/manually defined
Type Naming conventions- task/feature/userstory/issue bug/fix/bugfix
Name of the item- name of the userstory/ name of the task

The usage is simple, press on the settings button to configure your preferences
The default settings are git naming conventions,
And to generate a name, press on an item in the sprints board, and then open the extension, you will see the branch name at the top,

currently this extension is working only in the Sprints Board, for any issues, requests, feedback and contribution,
feel free to raise an issue in the Github repository
https://github.com/dorlugasigal/azdo-branch-name-generator-extension/
